title: Binding Rayne
description: Demon sightings, missing girls, and dead witches.As a paranormal investigator, Rayne is no stranger to the unknown. But when she embarks on her latest case, her life takes a turn toward the magical.An ancient talisman and four sexy as hell Magical Keepers all but land in her lap, changing not only who she is, but what she will become. Rayne soon learns her newly acquired type of magic is sought out and destroyed. It might just seal her fate.Caught in between her old life and learning to be a witch, Rayne will be forced to decide between ending a curse or walking away and risking the lives of herself and others. Toussaint, Leif, Aedan, and Maceo are just as unprepared to become Rayne’s Keepers as she is to embrace her magical powers.Knowing she is the key to breaking the curse, can Rayne master her magic and fix what was broken?Don’t miss Binding Rayne, the first in the Keepers of the Talisman series by Rowan Thalia. If you like paranormal sightings, shifters, witches, and tempting men, this reverse harem will have you turning the pages!
author: Rowan Thalia
